problem.title: CheckPoint: Spinning Rod
problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
#Enter the computations here a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) l=lc_choose(a,0.6,0.8,1.2) m=lc_choose(b,0.08,0.18,0.24) v=lc_choose(c,2.5,3.5,4.0)
L=25* m* v* l

part.p: A light rigid rod of length 3L has small spheres of masses m, 2m, 3m and 4m attached as shown. The rod is spinning in horizontal plane about a vertical axis passing through m. The linear speed of mass 3m is v = $v m/s.
If L = $l meters and m = $m kilograms, find the angular momentum of the rod.
